overview: Everything Live is a live video released in 1997, just after the Manics fourth album, Everything Must Go, a major commercial and critical success for the band. The atmosphere of the performance is great, with the bands and fans coming together after Richey's disappearance to create a wonderful, tense, sad and beautiful mood. Musically the Manics rock out with excellent versions of 7 of their best songs to date when the video was made and 6 tracks from the aforementioned then-new album, with Elvis Impersonator and No Surface All Feeling the picks of these.
title: Manic Street Preachers - Everything Live
